entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • An item with the same key has already been added #26757
  • Query: Rownumber conversion needs better logic to figure out partitions #26756
  • EF Core 6 reports variable name '@XXX' has already been declared #26754
  • Query: Property binding on the result entity from grouping.First #26753
  • Self-referencing entity circular dependency happening just on EF Core 6.0 #26750
  • Operations on IQueryable after GroupBy.Select #26748
  • Query performance decrease when updating from 2.1 to 5.0 #26747
  • Bug in Navigation Fixer when replacing records that contain a HashSet #26745
  • EF core 6 selecting null values despite where clause asking for not null #26744
  • EF incorrectly sets "Precision" instead of "Scale" on "VarTime" data types in EFCore.SqlServer #26742
  • Code inheritance without database inheritance #26741
  • Null semantics compensation missing for LIKE negation #26735

Closed

  • Calling SqliteConnection from Microsoft.Data.Sqlite v6.0.0 throws TypeInitializationException #26729
  • Blazor - disposed DbContext conflicts with other instance of DbContext #26743
  • Evolve null-checking approach #19233
    7.0.0
  • TypeLoadException on Update-Database with EFCore 6.0.0 #26749
  • Re-attaching m2m entities on a skip navigation #26610
  • TemporalAll() in Temporal Tables with child entity gives System.InvalidOperationException when used with Include() #26704
  • Translating this query requires the SQL APPLY operation, which is not supported on SQLite. #26684
  • Could not install package 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 6.0.0'. You are trying to install this package into a project that targets '.NETFramework,Version=v4.7.2', but the package does not contain any assembly references or content files that are compatible with that framework. For more information, contact the package author. #26683
  • Cannot create default/global query filter with variable when using an EntityTypeConfiguration class. #26666
  • Foreign Key Case Sensitive Issue in EF Core v5.x #26647
  • DbScaffold should honor table names in n:m-relations #26607
  • Int64 properties cannot be queried in EntityCore #26603
  • Does .UseLazyLoadingProxies() not work in XUnitTests? #26597
  • Slow inserts in EF Core after upgrading to .Net 5 #26570
  • EF Core materializes projection property as object with default values instead of null #26551
  • EF Core 6 Unable to set up a many-to-many relationship between '' and '' because one or both of the navigations don't have a corresponding CLR property #26721
  • How to *not* nest entities with CosmosDb provider? #26746
  • EF Core 6 get notmapped/ignored members #26594
  • Ensure temporal tables tests run on PRs/C.I. #26040
    7.0.0
  • EF Core 6.0 InvalidOperationException: The object has been removed from the model #26611
    6.0.1
  • 'The object has been removed from the model.' when building model #26659
    6.0.1
  • EF Core 6.0 regression when using HasDefaultSchema() with ToTable(null) #26651
    6.0.1

PullRequests

Created

  • test and fix for Issue #26742 #26758
  • Fix some docs issues #26755
  • Tools: Use App.config on .NET Core #26752
  • Update NuGet packages #26751
  • [release/6.0] Update to Mac OS 11 image #26739
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Update to Mac OS 11 image #26738
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Update to Mac OS 11 image #26737
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Metadata: Remove obsoleted code #26740
    auto-merge
  • No skipped complex navigation tests #26561
  • Additional tests for Temporal tables #26682
    community-contribution
  • Remove quirks from main #26736
  • Update command to set connection string for SqlServer on Ubuntu #26055
  • Update to Mac 11 image #26732
    auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26728
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Test on .NET Framework #26733
  • Test mechanism to automatically rewrite baselines in source code #26723
  • Query: Fix double negation in SQL generation #26734
